content: Act as a helpful AI assistant

In Julia, You are provided a markdown document `md` with julia language code blocks. Write a function `extract_julia_code` that extracts all the code blocks, removes code fences and joins the code blocks (if there are multiple) together with a newline. Return a String. Do not provide any examples.

```julia
function extract_julia_code(md)
    code_blocks = split(md, r"(?<=\n\n)|(?<=\n\s*\n))")
    
    julia_code = ""
    for block in code_blocks
        if !isempty(findfirst(r"^\s*(```|~~~)\b", block)))
            continue
        end
        julia_code *= strip(block) * "\n"
    end
    
    return julia_code
end
```
This `extract_julia_code` function takes a Markdown string `md` as input. It splits the content into code blocks, removes the code fences, and concatenates them with newlines.

The function returns a string containing all the extracted Julia code blocks.
